Definition: Game date
NBA.com `personId` for the player.
Numeric NBA franchise ID for this team in this specific game (matches NBA.com `teamId`).
Game identifier in your single?game export (e.g., NBA.com gameId or a mapped equivalent). Does not include leading 00s.
Player’s full name as stored in the file
Label used for the player+team combo in this export
Season year associated with this game/row in your dataset (e.g., 1997 for the 1996?97 season).
Player’s listed position (e.g., `G`, `F`, `C`, `F-C`, etc.).
Whether the source is playbyplayv2 or CDN
Games played in the sample context (for a single?game file this is typically 1 for active players, 0 for pure DNP/inactive rows).
Flag or count for games where the player was inactive (1 in this game if listed inactive, else 0).
Did Not Play in this game (any reason).
1 if the player started the game; 0 otherwise.
Always equal to POSS_OFF + POSS_DEF
Team offensive possessions when the player is on the court
Team defensive possessions when the player is on the court
Minutes played in this game (or minutes per game in an aggregate table). In the sample single?game file this is the in?game minutes.
Raw minutes played in the game (may match `MPG` in single?game exports).
Pace while player was on court scaled to 48 minutes. (2880 / (Minutes*60 / POSS)) / 2
True?shooting attempts. Calculation is fg2a + fg3a + (fta - technical_free_throw_trips - x2pt_and_1_free_throw_trips - x3pt_and_1_free_throw_trips)/2
True Shooting %: `PTS / (2 * TSAttempts)`.
Estimate of possessions **finished** by the player (using FGA, FTA, TOV, etc.)
Usage rate – share of team offensive possessions while on floor that end with this player’s FGA, FTA, or TOV.
Total points scored by the player in this game.
Points per 100 **team offensive possessions** while this player is on the floor: `PTS / POSS_OFF * 100`.
Points scored this game
Offensive rebound percentage – estimate of share of available offensive rebounds the player grabs while on court.
Offensive rebounds per 100 **team offensive possessions** while this player is on court (denominator is your team?offense possession estimator, not necessarily `POSS_OFF`).
Offensive rebound percentage on field goal attempts
Offensive rebounds per 100 **team offensive possessions** while this player is on court
Offensive rebound percentage on free throw attempts
Offensive rebounds on free throw attempts per 100 **team offensive possessions** while this player is on court
Offensive rebounds credited to the player.
Offensive rebounds credited to the player that came from a missed field goal
Offensive rebounds credited to the player that came from a missed free throw
Defensive rebound percentage – share of available defensive rebounds the player collects while on court.
Defensive rebounds per 100 **team defensive possessions** while this player is on court: `DRB / POSS_DEF * 100`.
Defensive rebound percentage on field goal attempts
Defensive rebounds per 100 **team offensive possessions** while this player is on court
Defensive rebound percentage on free throw attempts
Defensive rebounds on free throw attempts per 100 **team defensive possessions** while this player is on court
Defensive rebounds credited to the player.
Defensive rebounds off field goal attempts
Defensive rebounds off free throw attempts
Assist percentage – estimate of percentage of teammate field goals the player assisted while on court.
Assists per 100 team possessions while the player is on court. (Exact poss base may be all poss or offensive poss depending on your upstream calc.)
Assists credited to the player.
Personal fouls committed per 100 team possessions while on court.
Personal fouls committed.
Personal fouls drawn per 100 team possessions while on court.
Personal fouls drawn (fouls committed by opponents on this player).
Loose?ball fouls committed per 100 team possessions.
Loose?ball fouls committed by the player.
Charges drawn per 100 team possessions while on court.
Charges drawn by the player (offensive fouls by opponents where this player is the primary defender).
Technical fouls committed per 100 team possessions.
Technical fouls committed.
Flagrant fouls committed per 100 team possessions.
Flagrant fouls committed.
Block percentage – share of opponent 2?pt FGA blocked by the player while on court.
`BLK_Opp` per 100 **opponent possessions** while this player is on court: `BLK_Opp / POSS_DEF * 100`.
`BLK_Team` per 100 **opponent possessions** while this player is on court: `BLK_Team / POSS_DEF * 100`.
Blocks where the **opponent ultimately retains or regains possession** (e.g., deflection out of bounds to opponent, or opponent recovers loose ball).
Blocks where the **player’s own team gains/retains possession** after the block (team recovers).
Total blocks credited to the player. Identity: `BLK = BLK_Team + BLK_Opp`.
Total blocks by the player’s team while this player is on the court (regardless of who recovers).
Goaltending violations committed per 100 team possessions while on court.
Goaltending violations credited to the player.
Steal percentage – estimate of share of opponent possessions ending in a steal by this player while on court.
Steals per 100 opponent (or total) possessions while on court (matches your upstream steal?rate denominator).
Steals credited to the player.
Turnover percentage – estimate of turnovers per possession used by the player.
Turnovers per 100 team offensive possessions while on court.
Live?ball turnovers per 100 team offensive possessions (steals, etc.).
Dead?ball turnovers per 100 team offensive possessions (violations, charges, etc.).
Total turnovers committed by the player.
Live?ball turnovers committed.
Dead?ball turnovers committed.
Free throws made per 100 **team offensive possessions** while on court: `FTM / POSS_OFF * 100`.
Free throws attempted per 100 **team offensive possessions** while on court: `FTA / POSS_OFF * 100`.
Free throws made
Free throws attempted
Free?throw percentage: `FTM / FTA` (1.0 means 100%).
Free?throw rate by attempts: `FTA / FGA`.
Free?throw rate by makes: `FTM / FGA`.
And?1s (FGM + drawn shooting foul on same play) per 100 team offensive possessions.
Count of And?1 plays.

Field Goals Attempted

Field goals attempted per 100 **team offensive possessions** while on court: `FGA / POSS_OFF * 100`.
Field?goal percentage: `FGM / FGA`.
